snippet.title: D.O.T. Defence - Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Demo on Steam: D.O.T. Defence Demo https://store.steampowered.com/app/3134200/DOT_Defence_Demo/
Want more updates and to support the game? Wishlisting helps us out! 😀

More links:
- Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/YPeUmXmq
- Follow us on Twitter: https://x.com/axe_rattle
- Press Kit: https://impress.games/press-kit/rattleaxe-games/dot-defence

Dive into D.O.T. Defence! A streamlined RTS that combines deep strategy into quick, 5-10 minute matches. Play our Singleplayer Campaign mode, Build towers, command armies, and protect your HQ in intense 1v1, 2v2, or free-for-all battles. With a simplified economy and strategic depth, this game offers a nostalgic yet fresh experience. Whether you're battling waves of enemies or facing off against friends, every decision counts commander!

Ready to help us Conquer? Subscribe for more content updates!
#DOTDefence #RTS #TD #TowerDefense #gaming
